name: 末次治樹
info:
• 简体中文名: 末次治树
  • 别名: Haruki Suetsugu
  • 别名: Suetsugu Haruki
  • 别名: SENSEI
detail:
Haruki Suetsugu (末次治樹), also known as SENSEI, is an illustrator for Capcom.
Works:
Mega Man related
Mega Man: The Power Battle (Object design)
Mega Man Legends (Illustrations)
Mega Man Legends 3 (One of the nine designers of Aero in the first event)
Mega Man X4 (Illustrations)
Mega Man X5 (Original design)
Mega Man X6 (Original design)
Mega Man Xtreme (Original design)
Mega Man Xtreme 2 (Original design)

Other games
Armored Warriors
Cyberbots: Fullmetal Madness
Eco Fighters (Special thanks)
The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap (Scroll design, artwork)
The Punisher (Illustration design)
Quiz & Dragons
Star Gladiator - Episode 1: Final Crusade
Street Fighter II
Tech Romancer
Zack & Wiki: Quest for Barbaros' Treasure (Lead designer, character designer, 3D background concept supervisor)

works.name: ロックマンX6 / 洛克人X6
ロックマンX2 ソウルイレイザー / 洛克人X2 灵魂抹杀者
ロックマンX5 / 洛克人X5
ロックマンX サイバーミッション / 洛克人X 网络任务
